summary: This document is an email from Jes Staley to Jeffrey Epstein discussing employee numbers at JPMorgan in the UK, detailing the breakdown by city. The email highlights the total number of employees and specifies that the figures do not include temporary or contracted staff.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the sender of the email discussing employee numbers at JPMorgan.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient of the email regarding employee statistics at JPMorgan.

connections.description: Jes Staley is communicating with Jeffrey Epstein regarding employment statistics at JPMorgan.

keyFacts: Jes Staley sent an email to Jeffrey Epstein on January 25, 2010.
The email discusses a total of 12,803 employees across JPMorgan in the UK.
The breakdown of employees by city includes London, Bournemouth, Glasgow, Edinburgh, and Swindon.
The figures provided do not include temporary or contracted staff.
